system.description:
Your prowess with your two disciplines increases, and you have begun to learn to truly weave them into a cohesive whole. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Strength, Intelligence or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You can spend an hour performing a special magical ritual on a martial melee weapon. If you do, you attune to the weapon, and it gains the following features:
    • The weapon always counts as a spellcasting focus for you.
    • It gains the Breaker, Parrying, and Vicious properties.
    • While you are wielding the weapon, you have @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.jaj686a9y3t0an5y]{Spiritual Weapon} prepared as your choice of a wizard or herald spell. It does not count against your spells prepared.
  • When you would gain a new Divine Lesson or Elective Study, you can choose freely from either list.
